name: Break It: If you Can
description:
Break It : If you Can is a fundamental game for your mobile device. Let's start the journey of smashing obstacles.

Break all the glass in this orbiting styled fast paced game. In Break It : If you Can move yourself with the help of your finger. You can adjust the direction to break and smash all the glass coming in your way with the help of rolling ball .
Don't avoid any glass to hit in this game and smash it hard! But be careful with the red balls as you have to avoid them. Smashing glass has never been so fun. Your running ball experience will be on sky level with this fantastic game.
Lets get started and see how far you can go in this fast paced break the glass game for enormous crazy destroyer fun.

How to play:
Tap to change the direction of running ball in the orbital world

Game Features:
• Fast paced break the glass game.
• Roll the ball to smash it hard.
• Random day and night mode in this roll the ball game.
• Astonishing and commendable graphics.
• 3D styled break the glass game.

Let's start orbital adventure journey with smashing experience !
